validate.noContent: The selected profile has no resources

limit.min: Limit must be greater than or equal to 1
limit.valid: Limit must be a valid number

usage_fee.number: Usage fee must be a number
usage_fee.integer: Usage fee must be an integer
usage_fee.min: Usage fee must be greater than or equal to 0

file.1mb: File size must be less than 1MB
file.2mb: File size must be less than 2MB

validate.version: Version must be in format x.x.x

password.min: Password must be at least 10 characters long
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character

validate.term: You must agree to the terms and policy
validate.email: Email must be a valid email address

profile.run: Please select a profile to run

scale.min: Scale must be greater than or equal to 0.1
scale.max: Scale must be less than or equal to 1

width.number: Window width must be a number
width.min: Window width must be greater than or equal to 500

height.number: Window height must be a number
height.min: Window height must be greater than or equal to 100

spacing.min: Spacing must be greater than or equal to 0
spacing.max: Spacing must be less than or equal to 100

duration.min: Duration must be greater than or equal to 1000

num_thread.number: Number of threads must be a number
num_thread.min: Number of threads must be greater than or equal to 1

fontSize.number: Font size must be a number

validate.endTime: End time must be greater than start time
validate.invalidQuantity: The number of accounts must be equal to the number of profiles
validate.invalidAccount: User name or password is incorrect
